name: The Rotten Wooden Room TALP
description:
making the game for this game jam

Open for anyone to play-test, comment in the comment section if you find a bug. Also if you have any ideas on how to make the game better please feel free to comment that as well. This is my first game made in Adventuron classroom, and really first text-base game, I tried a turn the page to page number style years ago. However, i never finished that.
